quality_assessment: Subsection covers basic error categories but is missing comprehensive error code documentation, language-specific issues, boilerplate detection context, and false positive handling. The actual codebase has a sophisticated error system with structured error codes (E001-E059) and classification methods that are not documented.

issues.description: DebtmapError has structured error codes (E001-E059) with categories: I/O (E001-E009), Parse (E010-E019), Config (E020-E029), Analysis (E030-E039), CLI (E040-E049), Validation (E050-E059). These are not documented.
issues.fix_suggestion: Add 'Error Codes Reference' section documenting all error code ranges and their meanings. Include E001 (IO_FILE_NOT_FOUND), E002 (IO_PERMISSION_DENIED), E010 (PARSE_SYNTAX), E020 (CONFIG_INVALID), etc.

issues.description: Errors have is_retryable() and is_user_fixable() classification methods that help users understand which errors are transient vs permanent. This is not documented.
issues.fix_suggestion: Add section explaining error classification: retryable errors (resource busy, timeout, connection issues) vs non-retryable (parse errors, config errors). Document that parse/config/CLI/validation errors are user-fixable.

issues.description: Coverage processing errors are a distinct category with specific solutions but are not documented in the error messages reference.
issues.fix_suggestion: Add 'Coverage Errors' section documenting: coverage file format issues, function name matching failures, and the explain-coverage command for diagnostics.

issues.description: The codebase has extensive false positive reduction mechanisms (context-aware detection, pattern-based classification, --no-context-aware flag) but the error messages reference doesn't explain how to handle false positive reports.
issues.fix_suggestion: Add 'Handling False Positives' section explaining: context-aware analysis (enabled by default), --no-context-aware flag, how pattern detection reduces false positives, and when to expect false positives.

issues.description: The topics list includes 'Boilerplate detection' but the document doesn't explain boilerplate detection errors or how to interpret boilerplate recommendations.
issues.fix_suggestion: Add section explaining boilerplate detection messages: what they mean, when files are classified as boilerplate (20+ impl blocks, high method uniformity, low complexity), and how to act on recommendations.

issues.description: Document mentions .debtmap/config.toml but the actual config location is debtmap.toml in the project root or ~/.config/debtmap/config.toml for global config.
issues.fix_suggestion: Update configuration error section to reference correct config file locations: project-level debtmap.toml and global ~/.config/debtmap/config.toml.

issues.description: The topics list includes 'Language-specific issues' but document doesn't address Rust-specific parsing issues (macros, proc-macros) or Python support status.
issues.fix_suggestion: Add section documenting language-specific considerations: Rust macro handling (--verbose-macro-warnings, --show-macro-stats), Python/JS support status (stub support), and language detection.

issues.description: DebtmapError provides exit codes (1-5) for different error categories but these are not documented for CI/CD integration.
issues.fix_suggestion: Add 'Exit Codes' section: 1 (I/O/Analysis error), 2 (CLI error), 3 (Config error), 4 (Validation error), 5 (Parse error). This helps CI/CD pipelines handle failures appropriately.

positive_aspects: Clear structure with error message, meaning, and solutions format
Covers major error categories (File System, Parse, Analysis, Configuration, Validation, Dependency, Concurrency, Pattern)
Provides practical command-line solutions with code blocks
Cross-references to related troubleshooting subsections (Quick Fixes, Debug Mode)
improvement_suggestions: Add comprehensive error code table with all E001-E059 codes
Document error classification (retryable vs permanent, user-fixable vs system)
Add section on false positive handling and context-aware analysis
Include exit code reference for CI/CD integration
Document boilerplate detection messages and recommendations
Update configuration file paths to current locations

metadata.validation_focus: Check error messages and language issues are documented
